Sequence Information.Peptide Name: NZ16R18R (peptide H8, Plectasin analog, NZ2114 derived, synthetic AMPs, UCSS1a; 3S=S)
Sequence Information.Source: Amino acid substitution, fungal defensin analog, fungi-derived, natural derivatives

Literature.Author: Chen H, Mao R, Teng D, Wang X, Hao Y, Feng X, Wang J. 2017
Literature.Title: Design and pharmacodynamics of recombinant NZ2114 histidine mutants with improved activity against methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (95%) toNZ2114G: 20%; C: 15%, K: 15%. H to R analog.Activity: active against Gram+ S. aureus ATCC 25923 or ATCC 6538 or MRSA ATCC 43300 (MIC 0.028-0.454 uM), S. suis CVCC3309 or CVCC3928 or CVCC606 (MIC 0.028-0.057 uM), S. pneumoniae CVCC1.8722 or CVCC2350 (MIC 1.818 uM), Gram- S-enteritidis CMCC50336 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-typhimurium ATCC14028 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-choleraesuis CVCC503 (MIC> 7.273 uM), S-pullorum CVCC1789 (MIC> 7.273 uM), and E-coli CVCC195 or CICC21530 (MIC> 7.273 uM).Recombinant production:yeast:Pichia pastoris: expressed and purified in a fermentor.
